# Player Expectations
## Welcome to Moffstation Welcome to our Station! Please read everything so that you know what's expected of you.
- [textlink="Follow the server's high-trust culture" link="MoffR0"] - [textlink="Play your character like a real person" link="MoffR1"] - [textlink="Don't ruin other people's fun" link="MoffR2"] - [textlink="No ERP" link="MoffR3"]
